title: Circuits - brightness of three light bulbs

content.description: What happens to the brightness of bulbs <math alttext="X" overflow="scroll"> <mi mathvariant="normal">X</mi> </math> and <math alttext="Y" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">Y</mi></math> when the switch is closed?
content.question: Bulb <math alttext="X" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">X</mi></math> Bulb <math alttext="Y" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">Y</mi></math> A Remains the same Becomes dimmer B Remains the same Remains the same C Becomes brighter Becomes dimmer D Becomes brighter Remains the same
